RESETPASSWORD.HEADLINE: Forgot your Password?
RESETPASSWORD.INTRO: Just enter your email address and you will receive a mail to reset your password.

EMAIL.MISSING: Please enter a valid email address.
EMAIL.INVALID: Sorry, this email address is not valid.

REQUEST_ERROR.SERVER_ERROR: Sorry, there seems to be something wrong! Please try again later.
REQUEST_ERROR.CLIENT_ERROR: Sorry, for this email address there is no account.

RESETPASSWORD.SUCCESS: You should receive an email soon. Please check your inbox.
